### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines (PEP 8, Black formatted)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (README, DESIGN, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated code comments and docstrings
- [ ] I have added usage examples if applicable

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt if new dependencies were added
- [ ] All new dependencies are necessary and well-justified

### Compatibility

- [ ] My changes are backward compatible
- [ ] OR I have documented breaking changes and migration path

### CI/CD

- [ ] All GitHub Actions workflows pass
- [ ] No merge conflicts with base branch
- [ ] Commits follow conventional commit format
